TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProfileBase extends System.Configuration.SettingsBase

summary.span: Provides untyped access to profile property values and information.

span.span: Provides untyped access to profile property values and information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 使用类，以创建用户配置文件使用的类。ASP.NET uses the class to create the class used for the user profile. ASP.NET 具有启用了用户配置文件的应用程序启动时，创建类型的新类`ProfileCommon`，它继承自类。When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class. 强类型化访问器添加到`ProfileCommon`配置节中定义的每个属性的类。Strongly typed accessors are added to the `ProfileCommon` class for each property defined in the configuration section. 强类型化访问器`ProfileCommon`类调用和方法基类，以检索并分别将配置文件设置属性值。The strongly typed accessors of the `ProfileCommon` class call the and methods of the base class to retrieve and set profile property values, respectively. 实例`ProfileCommon`类设置的值为ASP.NET 应用程序的属性。An instance of the `ProfileCommon` class is set as the value of the property for the ASP.NET application. 若要创建 ASP.NET 应用程序中的用户配置文件的实例，建议你使用方法。To create an instance of a user profile in an ASP.NET application, it is recommended that you use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示指定包含的用户配置文件的 Web.config 文件`ZipCode`类型的属性`string`和`RecentSearchList`类型的属性。The following code example shows a Web.config file that specifies a user profile that contains a `ZipCode` property of type `string` and a `RecentSearchList` property of type . 生成属性的当前将具有强类型化访问器为每个指定的属性。The generated property of the current will have strongly typed accessors for each of the specified properties. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示的 ASP.NET 页，读取并将设置`ZipCode`为用户配置文件指定的属性。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that reads and sets the `ZipCode` property specified for the user profile. 然后再尝试运行此代码，将提供程序设置默认值为`AspNetSqlProvider`中网站的 ASP.NET 配置设置。Before attempting to run this code, set the provider to the default `AspNetSqlProvider` in the ASP.NET configuration settings for the Web site. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase/VB/defaultvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例定义继承自的类类创建自定义配置文件。The following code example defines a class that inherits from the class to create a custom profile. 自定义配置文件的类型中指定`inherits`的应用程序的 Web.config 文件中的配置元素的属性。The type of the custom profile is specified in the `inherits` attribute of the configuration element in the Web.config file for an application. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/CS/employeeprofile.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/VB/employeeprofile.vb#1)]

span.para: 你可以创建继承自的自定义配置文件实现抽象类，并定义用户配置文件未指定配置元素中的属性。你可以在 Web.config 文件中指定自定义用户配置文件类型配置元素，如下面的示例中所示的属性。代码EmployeeProfile类包括在本主题的示例部分中。 ''<分析 inherits="Samples.AspNet.Profile.EmployeeProfile"defaultProvider ="SqlProvider"> <提供程序><清除 /> <添加名称 ="SqlProvider"type="System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider"connectionStringName ="sql 服务"description ="SQL 配置文件提供程序示例"/> <添加名称 ="EmployeeInfoProvider"type ="System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider"connectionStringName ="sql 服务"description ="员工信息的 SQL 配置文件 Provider"/> </providers><属性><添加名称 ="GarmentSize"/> </properties> < /配置文件 > \`\`\`

You can create a custom profile implementation that inherits from the abstract class and defines properties for the user profile that are not specified in the configuration element. You can specify a custom user-profile type in the Web.config file with the attribute of the configuration element, as shown in the following example. The code for the EmployeeProfile class is included in the Example section of this topic. ``` <profile inherits="Samples.AspNet.Profile.EmployeeProfile" defaultProvider="SqlProvider"> <providers> <clear /> <add name="SqlProvider" type="System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider" connectionStringName="SqlServices" description="SQL Profile Provider for Sample"/> <add name="EmployeeInfoProvider" type="System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider" connectionStringName="SqlServices" description="SQL Profile Provider for Employee Info"/> </providers> <properties> <add name="GarmentSize" /> </properties> </profile> ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 使用类，以创建用户配置文件使用的类。ASP.NET uses the class to create the class used for the user profile. ASP.NET 具有启用了用户配置文件的应用程序启动时，创建类型的新类`ProfileCommon`，它继承自类。When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class. 强类型化访问器添加到`ProfileCommon`配置节中定义的每个属性的类。Strongly typed accessors are added to the `ProfileCommon` class for each property defined in the configuration section. 强类型化访问器`ProfileCommon`类调用和方法基类，以检索并分别将配置文件设置属性值。The strongly typed accessors of the `ProfileCommon` class call the and methods of the base class to retrieve and set profile property values, respectively. 实例`ProfileCommon`类设置的值为ASP.NET 应用程序的属性。An instance of the `ProfileCommon` class is set as the value of the property for the ASP.NET application. > [!NOTE] > 用于生成存储中的类的基类可以使用重写属性`inherits`节的配置文件的属性。The base class used to generate the class stored in the property can be overridden using the `inherits` attribute of the section of the configuration file. 在这种情况下将指定的自定义类继承自基类。In this case you would specify a custom class that inherits from the base class. 此构造函数不是应用程序代码中使用。This constructor is not intended to be used from application code. 若要创建的用户配置文件的实例，使用方法。To create an instance of a user profile, use the method. ## Examples 下面的 Web.config 文件指定用户配置文件包含`ZipCode`类型的属性`string`和`RecentSearchList`类型的属性。The following Web.config file specifies a user profile that contains a `ZipCode` property of type `string` and a `RecentSearchList` property of type . 生成属性的当前将具有强类型化访问器为每个指定的属性。The generated property of the current will have strongly typed accessors for each of the specified properties. ``` ``` 下面的 ASP.NET 页读取并设置`ZipCode`为用户配置文件指定的属性。The following ASP.NET page reads and sets the `ZipCode` property specified for the user profile. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建和初始化新的配置文件实例，并可用于使用自定义配置文件的应用程序对象，或管理在非 ASP.NET 环境中的用户配置文件。The method creates and initializes a new profile instance and is useful for applications that use a custom profile object or manage user profiles in a non-ASP.NET environment. 此重载方法假定指定的用户名称是已验证的用户。This overload of the method assumes that the specified user name is an authenticated user. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建自定义配置文件对象的实例，设置一个属性，并将该配置文件保存到数据源。The following code example creates an instance of a custom profile object, sets a property, and saves the profile to the data source. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase.Create#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase.Create/CS/profileBaseCreatecs.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase.Create#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase.Create/VB/profileBaseCreatevb.aspx.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets a group of properties identified by a group name.

returns.span: A object for a group of properties configured with the specified group name.

span.span: A object for a group of properties configured with the specified group name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 配置文件属性可以分为组，以便更好地组织。Profile properties can be separated into groups for better organization. 属性可以用于检索一组属性按组名称。The property can be used to retrieve a group of properties by the group name. 此外可以通过指定组名称作为的成员访问组中的配置文件属性`Profile`每页上提供的属性。You can also access a profile property in a group by specifying the group name as a member of the `Profile` property available on each page. 例如，`ZipCode`配置文件是的成员的属性`Address`无法使用访问配置文件组`Profile.Address.ZipCode`。For example, the `ZipCode` profile property that is a member of the `Address` profile group could be accessed using `Profile.Address.ZipCode`. ## Examples 下面的 Web.config 文件指定包含具有的组名称的属性组的用户配置文件`Address`。The following Web.config file specifies a user profile that contains group of properties with a group name of `Address`. 为生成的分组的属性属性的当前将前面是组名称。The grouped properties generated for the property of the current will be preceded by the group name. 例如 `Profile.Address.Street`。For example, `Profile.Address.Street`. ``` ``` 下面的 ASP.NET 页读取，并设置为用户配置文件指定的分组的属性。The following ASP.NET page reads and sets the grouped properties specified for the user profile. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase/VB/defaultvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: The specified profile property group name was not found in the configuration section.

span.span: The specified profile property group name was not found in the configuration section.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 使用类，以创建用户配置文件使用的类。ASP.NET uses the class to create the class used for the user profile. ASP.NET 具有启用了用户配置文件的应用程序启动时，创建类型的新类`ProfileCommon`，它继承自类。When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class. 强类型化访问器添加到`ProfileCommon`配置节中定义的每个属性的类。Strongly typed accessors are added to the `ProfileCommon` class for each property defined in the configuration section. 强类型化访问器`ProfileCommon`类调用方法来检索从非类型化的值，生成的访问器，然后强制转换为指定类型和返回作为属性值。The strongly typed accessors of the `ProfileCommon` class call the method to retrieve untyped values from the that the generated accessor then casts as the specified type and returns as the property value. 你可以使用方法来按名称检索你的应用程序的用户配置文件的属性值。You can use the method to retrieve property values of the user profile for your application by name. 返回的值都是非类型化，并且必须强制转换为检索时的特定对象类型。Returned values are untyped and must be cast as the specific object type when retrieved. 对于配置文件属性值的强类型访问，你可以属性按名称访问为每一页上提供的配置文件属性的成员等`Profile.CustomerAddress`。For strongly typed access to profile property values, you can access the property by name as a member of the Profile property available on each page, for example, `Profile.CustomerAddress`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的 ASP.NET 页，读取并将设置`ZipCode`为用户配置文件指定的属性。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that reads and sets the `ZipCode` property specified for the user profile. 指定用户配置文件的属性的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅提供的示例类。For an example of a Web.config file that specifies properties for the user profile, see the example provided for the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase/VB/defaultvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Gets a value indicating whether the user profile is for an anonymous user.

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the user profile is for an anonymous user.

value.span: 如果用户配置文件适用于匿名用户;否则为。

span.span: if the user profile is for an anonymous user; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用配置部分启用匿名访问的用户配置文件和`allowAnonymous`用于指定配置文件属性的配置元素的属性。Anonymous access to the user profile is enabled using the configuration section and the `allowAnonymous` attribute of the configuration element used to specify profile properties.

summary.span: Gets a value indicating whether any of the profile properties have been modified.

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether any of the profile properties have been modified.

value.span: 如果任何配置文件属性进行了修改;否则为。

span.span: if any of the profile properties have been modified; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在过程配置文件提供程序可以使用属性方法来确定属性是否组成基元类型、 字符串或已更改对象。The property can be used by a profile provider during the method to determine whether properties that are made up of primitive types, strings, or objects have been changed. 更改的属性然后更新配置文件提供者在方法。Changed properties are then updated by the profile provider in the method. 自动在调用方法的末尾页执行如果属性是 `true`The method is automatically called at the end of page execution if the property is `true` 在中调用的配置文件提供方法显式无法确定与自定义类类型或复杂类型，例如集合、 配置文件属性是否已更改。A profile provider called in the method cannot explicitly determine whether a profile property with a custom class type or a complex type, such as a collection, has changed. 你可以使用事件可确定是否已修改的自定义对象，并可继续使用自动保存已修改的对象还是要取消自动保存，如果任何对象进行了不修改。You can use the event to determine whether a custom object has been modified and to continue with the automatic save for modified objects or cancel the automatic save if no objects have been modified. 默认行为类是设置属性`true`访问属性的自定义或复杂类型的第一次属性。The default behavior of the class is to set the property to `true` for properties that are of a custom or complex type the first time the property is accessed.

param.name: propertyName
param.span: The name of the profile property.

summary.span: Gets or sets a profile property value indexed by the property name.

span.span: Gets or sets a profile property value indexed by the property name.

value.span: 指定的配置文件属性值，该值类型化为。

span.span: The value of the specified profile property, typed as .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于检索或按名称设置为你的应用程序的用户配置文件的属性值。You can use this property to retrieve or set the property values of the user profile for your application by name. 返回的值被类型化为`object`并且必须强制转换为检索时的特定对象类型。Returned values are typed as `object` and must be cast as the specific object type when retrieved. 对于配置文件属性值的强类型访问，你可以访问属性按名称作为的成员`Profile`属性可在每个页面，例如， `Profile.CustomerAddress`。For strongly typed access to profile property values, you can access the property by name as a member of the `Profile` property available on each page, for example, `Profile.CustomerAddress`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例通过将绑定列出的用户配置文件中的属性名称从静态属性集合对象添加到控件。The following code example lists the names of the properties in the user profile by binding the property from the static collection of objects to a control. 所选的属性值通过名称使用集合。The selected property value is retrieved by name using the collection. 指定用户配置文件的属性的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅提供的示例类。For an example of a Web.config file that specifies properties for the user profile, see the example provided for the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase/CS/ViewProfilecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase/VB/ViewProfilevb.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于获取有关配置应用程序，包括属性名称和类型的配置文件属性的信息。You can use this property to get information about the profile properties configured for an application, including property names and types. 你还可以引用每个属性。You can also reference the of each property. A管理存储和检索的数据源的属性值。A manages storage and retrieval of property values to and from the data source. ## Examples 下面的代码示例通过将绑定列出的用户配置文件中的属性名称从静态属性集合对象添加到控件。The following code example lists the names of the properties in the user profile by binding the property from the static collection of objects to a control. 所选的属性值通过名称使用集合。The selected property value is retrieved by name using the collection. 指定用户配置文件的属性的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅提供的示例类。For an example of a Web.config file that specifies properties for the user profile, see the example provided for the class. summary.span: Updates the profile data source with changed profile property values.

span.span: Updates the profile data source with changed profile property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将修改后的配置文件属性值写入到数据源。The method writes modified profile property values to the data source. 配置文件提供程序执行更新可减少的数据源中的活动数量时，才属性设置为`true`。The profile provider can reduce the amount of activity at the data source by performing updates only when the property is set to `true`. 这是默认值的大小写。This is the case for the default . 后方法已保存到数据源中的属性值设置为`false`。After the method has saved the property values to the data source, is set to `false`. 你可以使用事件实现自定义逻辑，用于确定是否已修改与自定义的类型或复杂类型的配置文件属性和继续自动保存已修改的对象或如果没有对象具有取消自动保存已修改。You can use the event to implement custom logic that determines whether a profile property with a custom type or a complex type has been modified and continue with the automatic save for modified objects or cancel the automatic save if no objects have been modified.

summary.span: Sets the value of a profile property.

span.span: Sets the value of a profile property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 使用类，以创建用户配置文件使用的类。ASP.NET uses the class to create the class used for the user profile. ASP.NET 具有启用了用户配置文件的应用程序启动时，创建类型的新类`ProfileCommon`，它继承自类。When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class. 强类型化访问器添加到`ProfileCommon`配置节中定义的每个属性的类。Strongly typed accessors are added to the `ProfileCommon` class for each property defined in the configuration section. 强类型化访问器`ProfileCommon`类调用方法可以传递属性值复制到要存储在数据源。The strongly typed accessors of the `ProfileCommon` class call the method to pass property values to the to be stored at the data source. 你可以使用方法来按名称指定你的应用程序的用户配置文件中的属性值。You can use the method to assign property values in the user profile for your application by name. 值为非类型化，并在运行时，不是编译时将执行类型检查。Values are untyped, and type checking will be done at run time, not compile time. 对于配置文件属性值的强类型访问，你可以访问属性按名称作为的成员`Profile`属性可在每一页上，例如， `Profile.CustomerAddress`。For strongly typed access to profile property values, you can access the property by name as a member of the `Profile` property that is available on each page, for example, `Profile.CustomerAddress`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的 ASP.NET 页，读取并将设置`ZipCode`为用户配置文件指定的属性。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that reads and sets the `ZipCode` property specified for the user profile. 指定用户配置文件的属性的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅提供的示例类。For an example of a Web.config file that specifies properties for the user profile, see the example provided for the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase/VB/defaultvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Gets the user name for the profile.

span.span: Gets the user name for the profile.

value.span: 该配置文件或分配到配置文件的匿名用户标识符的用户名称。

span.span: The user name for the profile or the anonymous-user identifier assigned to the profile.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回的身份验证的用户配置文件关联的名称，或者如果分配到配置文件的匿名用户标识符属性是`true`。The property returns either the name of the authenticated user that the profile is associated with or the anonymous user identifier assigned to the profile if the property is `true`. 使用配置部分启用匿名访问的用户配置文件和`allowAnonymous`用于指定配置文件属性的配置元素的属性。Anonymous access to the user profile is enabled using the configuration section and the `allowAnonymous` attribute of the configuration element used to specify profile properties.
